title: A Boy called "Rabbit"
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Australia

Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
abstract: "I never got to find Rabbit after the war. I looked for him in his village beofre my tour of duty was over. I had hoped I could give him the photo."
description: Ken Cumming's dearest memory of the time he served in Vietnam was a young boy by the name of "Rabbit". While "Rabbit" couldn't speak English, he was popular with the Australian soldiers for his fast running and bravery.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002722; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]; Active; 2011
